help:
The Race Progress Bar shows the position of each player on the race track in a simplified way. It also shows the position of you and the other players, as well as the time differences (measured at the checkpoints).
Commands/Keys ------------------------ /progress - Opens/closes the settings GUI F7 (short press) - Toggles the Race Progress Bar F7 (long press) - Opens/closes the settings GUI
(The key may be changed by the serveradmin, please contact him if it doesn't work.)
